original_text: You will still wear your cloths on your heads. You will wear your shoes on your feet. You will not cry aloud or weep. You will suffer and you will be weak because of the punishment for your sins. You will cry quietly among yourselves.
korean_text: 수건으로 머리를 동인 채, 발에 신을 신은 채로 두고 슬퍼하지도 아니하며 울지도 아니하되 죄악 중에 패망하여 피차 바라보고 탄식하리라

sentences.original_text: You will still wear your cloths on your heads.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 여전히 너희의 옷을 머리에 쓰리라.

sentences.original_text: You will wear your shoes on your feet.
You will not cry aloud or weep.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 크게 울거나 슬피 울지 않으리라.

sentences.original_text: You will suffer and you will be weak
because of the punishment for your sins.
You will cry quietly among yourselves.
